briefdescription.para: Return 1 if the env var name is a truthy flag (1,true,yes,on).
Round up kB to MiB (ceil), clamped to 32-bit.
Parse integer kB from a "Key: 12345 kB" style line.
Grep one numeric (kB) key from a procfs text file.

parameterdescription.para: Key to match, e.g., "VmHWM:" or "VmRSS:" or "Rss:".

simplesect.para: 0 on success, -ENOENT if not found, negative errno otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Reset all metrics accumulators to zero.

detaileddescription.para: Reset process-wide KV counters to zero.

Subsequent snapshots will report zeros until producers add counts.
@thread_safety Safe; uses C11 atomics.

briefdescription.para: Atomically add to the KV hit counter.

detaileddescription.para: Add n KV hits to the process-wide counter.

parameterdescription.para: Number of hits to add (may be zero).

briefdescription.para: Atomically add to the KV miss counter.

detaileddescription.para: Add n KV misses to the process-wide counter.

parameterdescription.para: Number of misses to add (may be zero).

briefdescription.para: Atomically add to both KV counters.

detaileddescription.para: Add both hits and misses in one call (each may be zero).

briefdescription.para: Copy current counters into out and optionally reset them.

detaileddescription.para: Snapshot process-wide KV counters into out.

parameterdescription.para: Destination snapshot structure (must not be NULL).
If non-zero, zeroes accumulators after copying.

briefdescription.para: Best-effort sampling of peak RSS (resident set size).

detaileddescription.para: Best-effort sampling of process peak RSS, in MiB.

On Linux, prefers reading /proc/self/status (VmHWM). If unavailable, falls back to getrusage(RUSAGE_SELF).ru_maxrss. On non-Linux, only the getrusage fallback is used where available. Returns 0 if unsupported.

simplesect.para: Peak RSS in megabytes (MB), rounded down; 0 if unknown.

briefdescription.para: Implementation of runtime metrics (KV counters + RSS sampling).

detaileddescription.para:
This module backs the helpers declared in util_metrics.h:
Process-wide accumulators for KV hits/misses using C11 atomics.
A best-effort function that samples the process peak RSS in MiB.

Environment:
Set IE_DEBUG_RSS=1 to log which source (VmHWM/VmRSS/smaps_rollup/ getrusage/mach) was used and its raw units before conversion.
